actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to permit the National Park Service to accept privately donated funds and to expend such funds on property on the National Register of Historic Places.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of the Interior in the administration of the National Park Service to accept money which may be donated for the purposes of acquiring, restoring, or preserving any building, structure, or site which is maintained on the National Register of Historic Places.

titles.title: A bill to permit the National Park Service to accept privately donated funds and to expend such funds on property on the National Register of Historic Places.
